dct_title_s: Map of the Upper Raccoon Creek Basin showing availability of underground water
dct_alternative_sm: Ohio water plan inventory. Underground water resources. Upper Raccoon Creek Basin
dct_description_sm: Scale bar lower left corner of map.
Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.
"Prepared by HENRY L. PREE, JR., Geologist, Ohio Division of Water"
Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in the Upper Raccoon Creek Basin and quality of underground water.
